name: sersa
description: Sistema web full stack con Next.js y Nest.js

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.install:full: npm run install:backend:full && npm run install:frontend:full
scripts.install:backend:full: cd backend && npm install @nestjs/typeorm @nestjs/jwt @nestjs/passport typeorm pg bcrypt passport passport-jwt passport-local jsonwebtoken node-forge soap helmet @nestjs/throttler && npm install --save-dev @types/bcrypt @types/passport-jwt @types/passport-local @types/jsonwebtoken
scripts.install:frontend:full: cd frontend && npm install @tanstack/react-query @hookform/resolvers react-hook-form zod date-fns recharts tailwindcss-animate
scripts.setup:full: npm run install:full && echo Dependencias instaladas. Ver INSTALLATION.md para siguiente paso

author: Tu Nombre
